titles.title: Regulation A+ Improvement Act of 2020
Regulation A+ Improvement Act of 2020
To amend the Securities Act of 1933 with respect to small company capital formation, and for other purposes.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Financial Services.

bill.summary:
Regulation A+ Improvement Act of 2020
This bill increases the dollar limit of certain securities offerings exempt from registration requirements from $50 million annually to $75 million annually, adjusted in future years for inflation.
